# HashHive

> Distributed password cracking platform orchestrating hashcat across multiple agents with campaign management and real-time monitoring

## Core Documentation

- [AGENTS](AGENTS.md): AI assistant guidance for working with this codebase
- [CONTRIBUTING](CONTRIBUTING.md): Contribution guidelines and development workflow
- [MERN Guidance](MERN_GUIDANCE.md): Detailed technical guidance for TypeScript stack with Bun, Hono, PostgreSQL, React 19, and Turborepo
- [README](README.md): Main project documentation and getting started guide
- [SECURITY](SECURITY.md): Security policies, vulnerability reporting, and deployment best practices

## Specifications

- [Product Overview](.kiro/steering/product.md): Core capabilities, target users, and operational context
- [Project Structure](.kiro/steering/structure.md): Repository layout, backend architecture, and naming conventions
- [Technical Stack](.kiro/steering/tech.md): Bun + PostgreSQL + Hono architecture, libraries, and commands

## Implementation Plans

- [System Design](.kiro/specs/mern-migration/design.md): Architecture, data models, and API designs
- [Migration Requirements](.kiro/specs/mern-migration/requirements.md): TypeScript stack migration requirements from CipherSwarm
- [Task 1 Summary](.kiro/specs/mern-migration/TASK_1_SUMMARY.md): Project foundation and infrastructure setup completion
- [Task 2.2 Summary](.kiro/specs/mern-migration/TASK_2.2_SUMMARY.md): Database connection and base models implementation completion
- [Task Breakdown](.kiro/specs/mern-migration/tasks.md): Implementation task list with progress tracking

## Implementation Guides

- [Authentication Implementation](docs/authentication-implementation.md): Authentication and authorization system with JWT and sessions
- [Test Coverage Plan](docs/test-coverage-plan.md): Path to 80% branch coverage with current status and action items

## Optional

- [MERN Proposal](docs/MERN_proposal.md): Original migration proposal and rationale
- [V2 Upgrade Overview](docs/v2-upgrade-overview.md): Version 2 upgrade summary
